verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O Thou in whose presence newline My soul takes delight, newline On Whom in affliction I call newline My Comfort by day newline And my Song in the night, newline My Hope, my Salvation, my All!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Where dost Thou, dear Shepherd, newline Resort with Thy sheep. newline To feed them in pastures of love? newline Say, why in the valley, newline Of death should I weep, newline Or alone in this wilderness rove?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O, why should I wander, newline An alien from Thee, newline Or cry in the desert newline For bread? newline Thy foes will rejoice, newline When my sorrows they see, newline And smile at the tears, newline I have shed.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Ye daughters of Zion declare, newline Have you seen the star, newline That on Israel shone. newline Say if in your tents, newline My beloved has been, newline And where with His flocks newline He is gone.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: He looks! And ten thousands newline Of angels rejoice, newline And myriads wait for His word. newline He speaks! And eternity, newline Filled with His voice, newline Re-echoes the praise of the Lord.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Dear Shepherd! I hear, newline And will follow Thy call; newline I know the sweet sound of Thy voice. newline Restore and defend me, newline For Thou art my all, newline And in Thee I will ever rejoice.
